action.action-desc: Ms. Slotkin (for herself, Mr. Posey, Mr. Turner, and Mr. Bergman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Defense to provide to each health care provider of the Department of Defense training regarding the potential health effects of perfluoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substances.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the PFAS Training For DoD Providers and Servicemembers Act.

section.header: Mandatory training on health effects of perfluoroalkyl or poly足fluor足o足al足kyl substances
section.text: The Secretary of Defense shall provide to each health care provider of the Department of Defense mandatory training regarding the potential health effects of perfluoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substances.
